dcterms:description: Better Extraction from Text Towards Enhanced Retrieval (BETTER) is an information extraction and information retrieval program. One of the tasks in this program is Abstract event extraction. For this task, training (and validation) data is available only in English and test data is available in English, Arabic, Farsi and Korean. There are no event type distinctions in the Abstract event task.
dcterms:title: BETTER Abstract

dcterms:description: In contrast to the Abstract task, the events in the BETTER Basic task have event types associated with them. The Phase-1 ontology has 69 event types. The training (and validation) annotations are provided for English and test data is available for English and Arabic.
dcterms:title: BETTER Basic Phase-1

dcterms:description: The Phase-2 BETTER Basic task expands the Phase-1 ontology to cover 92 event types. Training (and validation) annotations are provided for English and test data is available for English and Farsi.
dcterms:title: BETTER Basic Phase-2

dcterms:creator: G. Doddington
A. Mitchell
M. Przybocki
L. Ramshaw
S. Strassel
R. Weischedel
dcterms:description: The Automatic Content Extraction (ACE) dataset is extensively used in literature to benchmark monolingual and cross-lingual capabilities of information extraction systems. For this task, training, validation, and test data is available in English, Arabic and Chinese.
dcterms:title: ACE

dcterms:creator: A. Pouran Ben Veyseh
M. V. Nguyen
F. Dernoncourt
T. Nguyen
dcterms:description: The MINION dataset is a large-scale and diverse dataset for multilingual event detection. It borrows its ontology from ACE and has 16 event types.
dcterms:title: MINION
